alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Montgomery; Telfair; Treutlen; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 7:44PM EST until January 12 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EST FOR SOUTHEASTERN LAURENS...EAST CENTRAL TELFAIR...SOUTHWESTERN TREUTLEN...WHEELER AND MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 744 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lowery to Landsburg to near Alamo to near McRae, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Alamo, Mount Vernon, Glenwood, Ailey, Scotland, Higgston, Towns, Lothair, Spring Hill, Landsburg, Cedar Grove, Barnhill, Jordan and Lowery. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central and east central Georgia. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
